title: And So to Bed: 24 Original Handknits for Girls and Boys
description: "Bedtime" is the theme of Lucinda Guy's cozy collection of handknits for girls and boys, ages two to five.In this new collection from Lucinda Guy, the handknit designs take "Bedtime" as their theme, with lots of comfy slippers, socks, and dressing gowns, cuddly cardigans, soft and squishy toys, wrap-around blankets?even pajama cases and hot water bottle covers. These designs are all about fun-filled styling, although the palette is soft and subdued: dove grays, mouse browns, dusky pinks, duck-egg blues. Lucinda also turns her eye toward texture, with some great stitch patterns, including a Man in the Moon blanket and a lovely cabled cardigan. Abounding with items that will make bedtime fun, And So to Bed is a sweet dream of a book. A Crafter's Choice Book Club Selection
